entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist, introduced as someone who cannot bear to reside in a body full of the force he detests.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Harry's friend and godfather, mentioned as someone who would not have died if Harry had not gone to save him.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The protagonist, introduced as someone whose heart saved him from Voldemort.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A wise and powerful wizard, mentioned as the one who explained the prophecy to Harry.

relationships.description: Voldemort detests Harry's body, which is full of the force he cannot bear.

relationships.relationship_type: could not bear to reside in
relationships.description: Voldemort could not bear to reside in Harry's body.
Dumbledore explained the prophecy to Harry.
Harry went to save Sirius, which led to Sirius' death.

relationships.relationship_type: could not bear to reside in
relationships.description: Voldemort could not bear to reside in Dumbledore's body (implied by the context).
According to the prophecy, one of them has to kill the other.
Dumbledore confirmed that according to the prophecy, one of them has to kill the other.
